item.title: Security incidents in Mali: diving in with visualization
item.description: No shortcut to learning When I started writing this post, I was fairly confident it would be quick. After all, I had all the materials I needed, a bunch of scripts I had spent months writing. It was supposed to be a matter of copy-and-paste. I was wrong. You see, once again, I underestimated the power of the monster in me who wants to get it right all the time. Donâ€™t get me wrong.
